name: The Man Who Dashed Through Universe
name_original: The Man Who Dashed Through Universe
description:
Play as the man who can dash through universe to escape form the military lab!

Use WASD to move 

Press SPACE to dash to the Shadowvers

Dash at the Shadowvers to kill enemies

Programming & game design - Abdullah Al-Zeer @AbdullahZeer27

Character art & Environment art - Abdullah Al-hejji @al7jy97

Character art - Maan Al-majed   @Maanalmajed

Sound design - Abdulelah Alghamdi
